Uses of LineReader in htsjdk.tribble.readers
 

Methods in htsjdk.tribble.readers that return LineReader
static LineReader LineReaderUtil.fromBufferedStream(java.io.InputStream stream)
          Like LineReaderUtil.fromBufferedStream(java.io.InputStream, LineReaderUtil.LineReaderOption), but the synchronicity option is determined by Defaults: if asynchronous I/O is enabled, an asynchronous line reader will be returned.
static LineReader LineReaderUtil.fromBufferedStream(java.io.InputStream bufferedStream, LineReaderUtil.LineReaderOption option)
          Convenience factory for composing a LineReader from an InputStream.
